src:
Živadinović oštro po Zvezdi: Dokle više foliranje, ovo je polukvalitet
07 Nov 2019, 19:45 by Zile
Nekadašnji trener Crvene zvezde, Milan Živadinović, pokomentarisao je ubedljiv poraz crveno-belih u duelu sa Totenhemom.
Popularni „Bard“ nije mnogo štedeo igrače Vladana Milojevića.
– Nikad slabija Zvezda! Imao sam utisak i da priprema utakmice nije urađena kako treba, da igrači nisu izašli na teren maksimalno motivisani. Imali su sve preduslove da odigraju bolje, a tu pre svega mislim na najbolju publiku na svetu, rekao je Živadinović tokom gostovanja na TV Pink.
– Igrači Zvezde imaju polukvalitet. Ne možeš da baziraš budućnost samo na prodaji igrača, da se pojedinci obogate, a tim oslabi. Gde su naši mladi fudbaleri? Fudbal je postao samo interesna sfera za neke ljude.
Živadinović se javno zapitao dokle više foliranje.
– Odigrali smo jako slabo, neinventivno. U prvom poluvremenu smo dva puta prišli golu Totenhema. Ovo sve govorim kao veliki zvezdaš. Dokle više foliranje? Zvezda je igrala i sa jačim timovima od Totenhema i pobeđivala ih, zaključio je iskusni stručnjak.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Zivadinovic sharply on Star: As far as faking it, this is half-quality
07 Nov 2019, 18:45 by Zile
Former Red Star coach Milan Zivadinovic commented on the convincing defeat of the Red and Whites in a match with Tottenham.
The popular "Bard" didn't save Vladan Milojevic's players much.
- Never a weaker Star! I also had the impression that the preparation of the game was not done properly, that the players did not come out on the field with maximum motivation. They had all the prerequisites to play better, and above all I mean the best audience in the world, said Zivadinovic during his appearance on TV Pink.
- Star players have a semi-quality. You can't base your future solely on player sales, individuals get rich, and the team weakens. Where are our young football players? Football has become just an area of interest for some people.
Zivadinovic wondered publicly how much more faking.
- We played very poorly, uninventively. In the first half we scored twice on Tottenham's goal. I say all this as a big star. How much more foil? The star also played with stronger teams than Tottenham and beat them, an experienced expert concluded.
